marklogic.body:
Let's go boys 77 down 5 more to go to finish Off what has been an incredible season.
This rebuild thingy is pretty interesting. Some teams do it and it takes a long period. Or it can go your wy, pieces can come together, players have a "career season" and voil you're vying for a playoff Spot at the nd of the year. Take it to Philly, don't let up, skate, hit'em hard and drive to the net.
Go sens go
